price: Kò sí oúnjẹ kan fún wọn àyàfi igi ẹlẹ́gùn-ún gbígbẹ.
arabic: لَّيۡسَ لَهُمۡ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: laysa lahum ṭaʿāmun illā min ḍarīʿin
